data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: During the late 1930s and through the 1940s-the heyday of big band jazz and swing music - the guitar was an important rhythm section instrument. Some ____, ____ as Freddie Green ____ Count Basie's band, developed a guitar-specific ____ of ____. Few ____ the ____ bands, however, featured ____ guitar ____, ____ were ____ instead ____ the ____ combo ____. The most important jazz guitar soloists of this period included the Manouche virtuoso Django Reinhardt, Oscar Moore who was featured with Nat "King" Cole's trio, and Charlie Christian of Benny Goodman's band and sextet, who was a major influence despite his early death at 25.
data.partBlankContent: During the late 1930s and through the 1940s-the heyday of big band jazz and swing music - the guitar was an important rhythm section instrument. Some guita_____, su__ as Freddie Green o_ Count Basie's band, developed a guitar-specific st___ of accomp_______. The most important jazz guitar soloists of this period included the Manouche virtuoso Django Reinhardt, Oscar Moore who was featured with Nat "King" Cole's trio, and Charlie Christian of Benny Goodman's band and sextet, who was a major influence despite his early death at 25.
data.answer: 在20世纪30年代末和40年代，大乐队爵士乐和摇摆乐的全盛时期，吉他是一种重要的节奏乐器。一些吉他手，如贝西伯爵乐队的弗雷迪·格林，发展了一种吉他特有的伴奏风格。然而，很少有大乐队会在小型组合中进行放大吉他独奏。这一时期最重要的爵士吉他独奏者包括马努什大师姜戈·莱因哈特(Django Reinhardt)，纳特·“金”·科尔(Nat“King”Cole)的三人组中的奥斯卡·摩尔(Oscar Moore)，以及班尼·古德曼(Benny Goodman)乐队和六人组中的查理·克里斯蒂安(Charlie Christian)，尽管他25岁就英年早逝，但他对爵士乐产生了重大影响。
